question: Which state (excluding UTs) has the {stat_method_1} {num_col} concentration per square kilometer based on the {stat_method_2} {num_col} values?
code:
def true_code():
    import pandas as pd
    main_data = pd.read_pickle("preprocessed/main_data.pkl")
    states_data = pd.read_pickle("preprocessed/states_data.pkl")
    ncap_funding_data = pd.read_pickle("preprocessed/ncap_funding_data.pkl")

    state_pm25 = main_data.groupby('state')['{col}'].{method_2}.reset_index()
    states_area = states_data[states_data['isUnionTerritory'] == False][['state', 'area (km2)']]
    merged_df = state_pm25.merge(states_area, on='state', how='inner')
    merged_df['pm_per_km2'] = merged_df['{col}'] / merged_df['area (km2)']
    max_area_state = merged_df.sort_values('pm_per_km2').iloc[{method_1}]['state']
    print(max_area_state)
true_code()
